description:
In the wake of Fisher Tiger`s tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime`s ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I pirati del Sole si dividono
Scission dans l`équipage. Jinbei vs Arlong
The Sun Pirates Split! Jimbei vs. Arlong!
Раскол пиратов солнца. Джимбей против Арлонга
海賊団分裂 ジンベエVS[たい]アーロン
